name: Buen Dia Family School
description: Buen Dia is an inclusive Arts- focused preschool with a Spanish-bilingual program in a nurturing exploratory environment. Buen Dia Family School programs are filled with a wide variety of activities to engage the children and give them a wide-ranging, meaningful experience. On any given day students participate in art, music, Spanish group, dramatic storytelling, cooking, book time, small and large group gatherings, and, most importantly, free play, outdoor play and trips around the neighborhood
